import React,{Component} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; export default class Blog extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state= { post_blog : [], post_slug : this.props.match.params.slug, translate_list : [] }; } static defaultProps = { apiUrl : 'http://localhost/my-app1/' }; componentDidMount = async () =>{ const data2 = new FormData(); data2.append('get_translate', 'true'); const config2 = { method: 'post', url: this.props.apiUrl, headers:{}, data : data2 }; const translate_list = await axios(config2); this.setState({ translate_list : translate_list.data }); console.log(translate_list.data.months); /** */ const data = new FormData(); data.append('get_post_by_slug', true); data.append('slug', this.state.post_slug); const config = { method: 'post', url: this.props.apiUrl, headers: {}, data : data }; const post_box = await axios(config); this.setState({ post_blog : post_box.data }); const date=post_blog.data.date.split() } render(){ const {post_blog,post_slug}=this.state; console.log(post_blog); return(
